summary: 60 year old widow and cystic fibrosis sufferer Daisy (Gayle Wells) hooks up with crack addicted lonely ex-cop Rick (Walt Dongo) in a trailer park romance.
cast: Gayle Wells|Walt Dongo|Bill Nowlin|Walter Patterson|Vietnam Ron
keywords: trailer park|surrealism|volleyball|death of lover|title spoken by character
title: In Our Garden
